sources.title: Spirit of Youth
sources.description: Based (loosely) on the life of Joe Louis. Except that Louis never lost a professional fight (until after this movie was made, at least). Head of the Production Code office Joseph Breen warned that the film might not get played in the South because it depicted a black man (Joe Louis) defeating several white men in boxing matches.

sources.title: Spirit Of Youth (1938)
sources.description: Joe Louis, Clarence Muse, Mantan Moreland

sources.title: Spirit of Youth (1938) JOE LOUIS FIGHT FILM
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Stars: Joe Louis, Clarence Muse and Mantan Moreland
Director: Harry L. Fraser

The story of the rise of boxer Joe Thomas, which paralleled the life of Joe Louis.

metadata.Plot: The story of the rise of boxer Joe Thomas, which paralleled the life of Joe Louis.
metadata.Actors: Joe Louis, Clarence Muse, Edna Mae Harris
